doc.after: The Saint Francis Health System owns several hospitals with a central location at Saint Francis Hospital in the southern part of the city. The facility contains 700 doctors and 918 beds,[172] and with more than 7,000 employees, the network is the second largest healthcare employer in the state.[173] The health system also operates a heart hospital, which was named by General Electric in 2004 one of the most advanced heart hospitals in the nation.[174] St. John Medical Center, located in an 11-story midtown center, employs nearly 700 doctors.[175] Other networks, such as Hillcrest Health System, operate a number of facilities in varying sizes.[176] Beginning in 2007, the city elected to renew a five-year contract with EMSA for ambulance service after a period of consideration to switch to the Tulsa Fire Department for providing such services.[177]
